original_title: Straight Boys Gay Boys 2: I Never Promised You a Rose Garden
overview: In the second instalment of the Straight Boys Gay Boys series from director Toby Ross, open-minded straight boys get manipulated by smart, clever and very cute gay boys. Guess what... they love it! Rarely has a sequence of shorts been hot, sexy and funny at the same time. This criss-crossing, carnal bridge between straight and gay is where it all happens. This is a small, fun ride for your fantasies to come alive told in six well-scripted, fully developed (and delightfully raunchy) stories.
title: Straight Boys Gay Boys 2: I Never Promised You a Rose Garden
